definition: Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

sentences.english: This includes the government of Sudan," as well as rebel groups.
sentences.chinese: 這也包括蘇丹政府，而不僅僅是反政府組織。

sentences.english: Intense, coconut and vanilla, with a hint of sultana, lemon and peat.
sentences.chinese: 激烈，椰子和香草，並暗示蘇丹娜，檸檬和泥炭。

sentences.english: Women carry bundles of firewood on their heads in the Sudanese desert.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹沙漠中，婦女們頭頂着捆好的柴薪。

sentences.english: Near Mohammed Sultan, Clarke Quay, Great World City, Orchard Road, Killinery.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德蘇丹，克拉碼頭，躋身世界大都會，烏節路。

sentences.english: Organizers hope to hold the next session in south Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 組織者希望下次會議在南蘇丹召開。

sentences.english: The red flag is flying high in the Chinese Embassy in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐蘇丹大使館，五星紅旗高高飄揚。

sentences.english: TRIUMPH for justice or a blow to peace in Sudan?
sentences.chinese: 這到底是伸張了正義還是破壞了蘇丹的和平局勢？

sentences.english: Beijing purchases nearly five percent of its total oil imports from South Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 北京的石油進口有將近5%來自南蘇丹。

sentences.english: Human cases of Rift Valley fever (RVF) continue to occur in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 人間裂谷熱病例在蘇丹持續增加。

sentences.english: Several thousand observers from Sudan and abroad monitored the vote.
sentences.chinese: 來自蘇丹和國外的數千名觀察員監督了投票。

sentences.english: II. During the visit, President Hu Jintao had a meeting with H.M. Sultan.
sentences.chinese: 訪問期間，胡錦濤主席與蘇丹陛下舉行了會談。

sentences.english: Last year the court indicted the minister for humanitarian affairs in the Sudanese government, together with a janjaweed leader.
sentences.chinese: 去年法庭起訴了蘇丹政府的人道主義事務部部長。

sentences.english: The daughters of a Sultan do not marry poor boys from the city.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹的女兒是不會嫁給窮小子的。

sentences.english: The Sultan sings and a Jackal falls in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹在歌唱，豺狗倒在了樹林裏。

sentences.english: I have been in Garsila, West Darfur, for about two weeks now.
sentences.chinese: 我在蘇丹西部的加爾西拉大概兩個星期了。

sentences.english: It may end up involved in the new state of South Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 在新成立的國家南部蘇丹的軍事存在可能會結束。

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
Armenia, capital Yerevan 埃里溫|埃里温[Ai1 li3 wen1]

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
